languages.text: На индустриальном мире отмечена странная активность, соответствующая имеющимся у дознавателя Инквизиции данным. Неообходимо изучить местность и отыскать кого-то, готового поделиться информацией — добровольно или под принуждением.

Strange activity has been detected on an industrial world, activity that matches intelligence received by the Inquisition's Interrogator. It is vital to explore the location and find someone there who can provide more information — whether willingly or under duress.
languages.original_text: На индустриальном мире отмечена странная активность, соответствующая имеющимся у дознавателя Инквизиции данным. Неообходимо изучить местность и отыскать кого-то, готового поделиться информацией — добровольно или под принуждением.

traits.locale_text: Strange activity has been detected on an industrial world, activity that matches intelligence received by the Inquisition's interrogator. It is vital to explore the location and find someone there who can provide more information — whether willingly or under duress.

Strange activity has been detected on an industrial world, activity that matches intelligence received by the Inquisition's interrogator. It is vital to explore the location and find someone there who can provide more information — whether willingly or under duress.

Strange activity has been detected on an industrial world, activity that matches intelligence received by the Inquisition's interrogator. It is vital to explore the location and find someone there who can provide more information — whether willingly or under duress.

Strange activity has been detected on an industrial world, activity that matches intelligence received by the Inquisition's Interrogator. It is vital to explore the location and find someone there who can provide more information — whether willingly or under duress.

languages.text: 行商浪人在这个工业世界中探查到了古怪的情况，这些情况与审判庭的审讯官收到的情报相符。行商浪人需要探索这片区域，寻找有没有其他人可以提供更多线索。无论那些人是自愿协助，还是在逼问之下才说出实情，都不要紧。
languages.original_text: Strange activity has been detected on an industrial world, activity that matches intelligence received by the Inquisition's Interrogator. It is vital to explore the location and find someone there who can provide more information — whether willingly or under duress.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人在这个工业世界中探查到了古怪的情况，这些情况与审判庭的审讯官收到的情报相符。行商浪人需要探索这片区域，寻找有没有其他人可以提供更多线索。无论那些人是自愿协助，还是在逼问之下才说出实情，都不要紧。

languages.text: 産業惑星で奇妙な活動が検出された。その活動は異端審問庁のインテロゲイターが受け取った情報と一致している。その場所を探索し、自発的または強制的に、より多くの情報を提供できる人を見つけることが必須だ。
languages.original_text: Strange activity has been detected on an industrial world, activity that matches intelligence received by the Inquisition's Interrogator. It is vital to explore the location and find someone there who can provide more information — whether willingly or under duress.

traits.locale_text: 産業惑星で奇妙な活動が検出された。その活動は異端審問庁のインテロゲイターが受け取った情報と一致している。その場所を探索し、自発的または強制的に、より多くの情報を提供できる人を見つけることが必須だ。

languages.text: Se ha detectado actividad extraña en un mundo industrial que se corresponde con los datos recibidos por el Interrogador de la Inquisición. Es esencial explorar el lugar y encontrar a alguien capaz de proporcionar más información, sea voluntariamente o no.
languages.original_text: Strange activity has been detected on an industrial world, activity that matches intelligence received by the Inquisition's Interrogator. It is vital to explore the location and find someone there who can provide more information — whether willingly or under duress.

traits.locale_text: Se ha detectado actividad extraña en un mundo industrial que se corresponde con los datos recibidos por el Interrogador de la Inquisición. Es esencial explorar el lugar y encontrar a alguien capaz de proporcionar más información, sea voluntariamente o no.

languages.text: Auf einer Produktionswelt wurden seltsame Aktivitäten festgestellt. Aktivitäten, die mit den Daten des Interrogators der Inquisition übereinstimmen. Es ist wirklich, den Planeten zu erkunden, um jemanden zu finden, der weitere Informationen bereitstellen kann ... sei es freiwillig oder unter Druck.
languages.original_text: Strange activity has been detected on an industrial world, activity that matches intelligence received by the Inquisition's Interrogator. It is vital to explore the location and find someone there who can provide more information — whether willingly or under duress.

traits.locale_text: Auf einer Produktionswelt wurden seltsame Aktivitäten festgestellt. Aktivitäten, die mit den Daten des Interrogators der Inquisition übereinstimmen. Es ist wirklich, den Planeten zu erkunden, um jemanden zu finden, der weitere Informationen bereitstellen kann ... sei es freiwillig oder unter Druck.

languages.text: Une étrange activité a été détectée sur un monde industriel, activité qui semble correspondre aux renseignements reçus par l'interrogateur de l'Inquisition. Il est vital d'explorer la zone et de trouver quelqu'un qui pourra fournir davantage d'informations, que ce soit volontairement ou non.
languages.original_text: Strange activity has been detected on an industrial world, activity that matches intelligence received by the Inquisition's Interrogator. It is vital to explore the location and find someone there who can provide more information — whether willingly or under duress.

traits.locale_text: Une étrange activité a été détectée sur un monde industriel, activité qui semble correspondre aux renseignements reçus par l'interrogateur de l'Inquisition. Il est vital d'explorer la zone et de trouver quelqu'un qui pourra fournir davantage d'informations, que ce soit volontairement ou non.

languages.text: Bir sınai dünyada tuhaf faaliyetler saptandı. Faaliyetler, Engizisyon Sorgucusu'nun edindiği bilgilerle uyuşuyor. Burayı keşfetmek ve orada kendi isteğiyle veya zorla daha fazla bilgi verebilecek birisini bulmak, büyük önem arz ediyor.
languages.original_text: Strange activity has been detected on an industrial world, activity that matches intelligence received by the Inquisition's Interrogator. It is vital to explore the location and find someone there who can provide more information — whether willingly or under duress.
